rules_text:
[i]Voice of Naga[/i] – Each player may play an additional land during each of their turns.
[i]Dragonstone+[/i] – Whenever a creature you control transforms or becomes promoted, discover 5.
[i]Lightsphere[/i] – {R}{G}{W}{U}: Create a token copy of target nonland permanent with mana value less than the number of lands you control, except the copy isn't legendary. It gains haste until end of turn, then exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
